summary.span: 为 Web 部件的个性化设置实现管理功能。

span.span: Implements management and administrative functionality for Web Parts personalization.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类提供多个静态方法和属性公开为 Web 部件个性化设置的管理功能。This class provides several static methods and properties that expose management and administrative functionality for Web Parts personalization. 这些方法应用于配置中的默认个性化设置提供程序Web 部件控件的控件。These methods apply to the default personalization provider configured in the control for a Web Parts control. 如果你需要管理充当个性化设置提供程序的多个数据存储，你应直接在单独的个性化设置提供程序类使用方法。If you need to administer several data stores that are acting as personalization providers, you should use the methods on the individual personalization provider classes directly. 请注意，集合的配置个性化设置提供程序控件是可从静态属性。Note that the collection of configured personalization providers for a control is available from the static property. 务必要注意，如果 Web 应用程序不会运行在默认信任级别，个性化设置将失败或更高版本 (可以在 Web.config 文件中使用设置自定义信任级别``元素)。It is important to be aware that personalization will fail if your Web application does not run at the default trust level of or higher (you can set custom trust levels in a Web.config file using the `` element). 并这两个类检查的信任等级初始化时。The and classes both check for a trust level of when they are initialized. 如果将应用程序运行在信任级别的配置，并使用默认提供程序来管理你的应用程序的个性化设置数据将应用程序尝试访问个性化设置数据的第一个时间失败，因为 ASP.NET 辅助进程中运行信任不具有的各个类中调用所必需的权限命名空间。If you configure your application to run at a trust level of , and you use the default provider to manage the personalization data for your application, the first time that the application tries to access personalization data, it will fail because an ASP.NET worker process running in trust does not have the permissions necessary to call into the various classes in the namespace. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用多种方法在类。The following code example demonstrates how to use several methods in the class. 此示例包含一个.aspx 页面，引用名为的 Web 部件用户控件`Persadmin.ascx`。This example consists of an .aspx page that references a Web Parts user control named `Persadmin.ascx`. 下面的代码提供的示例.aspx 文件。The following code provides the .aspx file for the example. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_PersAdmin#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PersAdmin/CS/defaultcs.aspx#7)] 此代码提供`Persadmin.ascx`控件。This code provides the `Persadmin.ascx` control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_PersAdmin#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PersAdmin/CS/PersAdmin.ascx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置提供程序指定的应用程序名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the application specified by the provider.
The application name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序名称会影响数据检索和保存的个性化设置提供程序，并允许多个应用程序通过设置一个相同的应用程序的名称，共享数据或数据通过指定的同一数据库中的不同分区应用程序名称。The application name affects the data retrieved and saved by the personalization provider, and allows for multiple applications to either share data by setting an identical application name, or partition data within the same database by specifying different application names. 在 Web.config 或 System.config 文件的个性化设置提供程序部分中找到该应用程序名称。The application name is found in the personalization provider section of the Web.config or System.config file. > [!CAUTION] > 因为服务的所有请求使用单个默认配置文件提供程序实例对象，可以有多个请求同时执行，并尝试设置属性值。Because a single default profile provider instance is used for all the requests served by an object, you can have multiple requests executing concurrently and attempting to set the property value. 属性不是线程安全的多个写入操作，并更改属性值可能会导致多个用户的应用程序的意外行为。The property is not thread-safe for multiple writes, and changing the property value can result in unexpected behavior for multiple users of an application. 建议您避免代码，以允许用户设置属性所需除外。It is recommended that you avoid code to allow users to set the property unless required. 应用程序的示例情况属性可能需要是管理多个应用程序的配置文件数据的管理应用程序。An example of an application where setting the property might be required is an administrative application that manages profile data for multiple applications. 此类应用程序应在单用户应用程序并不是 Web 应用程序。Such an application should be a single-user application and not a Web application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回的集合实例，每用户个性化设置状态信息位置`pathToMatch`参数值匹配的页上，路径`usernameToMatch`具有关联的个性化设置数据的用户名称匹配页上和用户被视为处于非活动状态。This method returns a collection of instances, per-user personalization state information where the `pathToMatch` parameter value matches the path of a page, `usernameToMatch` matches a user name that has personalization data associated with that page, and the users are considered inactive. 换而言之，对于每个返回记录用户的属性值是否小于或等于`userInactiveSinceDate`。In other words, for each returned record the user's property value is less than or equal to `userInactiveSinceDate`. 返回的集合仅包含实例。The returned collection contains only instances. 此方法将查询通配符字符传递给基础数据存储区。This method passes query wildcard characters to the underlying data store. 对通配符字符的支持是当前依赖于每个提供程序如何处理字符，如星号 （\*）、 百分号 （%） 或下划线 (_)。Support for wildcard characters is currently dependent on how each provider handles characters such as an asterisk (\*), a percent symbol (%), or an underscore (_). 通常情况下，对于符合 SQL 数据存储，你可以执行通配符搜索分部路径上加上使其不显示在开头、 末尾或搜索字符串文本中的中间的通配符属性。Normally, for SQL-compliant data stores, you can perform a wildcard search on a partial path with the wildcard character appearing at the beginning, the end, or the middle of the search string text in the property. 例如，若要查找以"~/vdir"开头的所有路径属性将设置为"~/vdir%"。For example, to find all paths that start with "~/vdir", the property would be set to "~/vdir%". 同样，对部分用户名执行通配符搜索可以允许显示的文本字符串中的任意位置的通配符字符属性。Likewise, a wildcard search on a partial user name could have the wildcard character appear at any point in the text string of the property. 例如，若要查找与"John"开头的所有用户名称属性如下所示"John %"。For example, to find all user names that start with "John", the property would look like "John%". 使用默认的个性化设置提供程序， -派生的对象返回按字母顺序，并按升序排序的路径和用户名称的组合。Using the default personalization provider, the -derived objects are returned in alphabetical order, and sorted by a combination of path and user name in ascending order. 集合中对象的顺序确定提供程序。The order of the objects in the collection is determined by the provider. 如果`userInactiveSinceDate`是，则此方法的返回的值不等效于。If `userInactiveSinceDate` is , then the returned values from this method are equivalent to . 这两`pathToMatch`并`usernameToMatch`可以是`null`。Both `pathToMatch` and `usernameToMatch` can be `null`. `usernameToMatch`参数可以包含逗号 （，），因为某些数据存储，例如运行 Microsoft SQL Server，允许使用逗号作为通配符。The `usernameToMatch` parameter can include commas (,) because some data stores, such as those running Microsoft SQL Server, allow commas as wildcard characters.

in the collection is determined by the provider. 如果`userInactiveSinceDate`是，则此方法的返回的值不等效于。If `userInactiveSinceDate` is , then the returned values from this method are equivalent to . 这两`pathToMatch`并`usernameToMatch`可以是`null`。Both `pathToMatch` and `usernameToMatch` can be `null`. `usernameToMatch`参数可以具有逗号 （，），因为某些数据存储，例如运行 Microsoft SQL Server，允许使用逗号作为通配符。The `usernameToMatch` parameter can have commas (,) because some data stores, such as those running Microsoft SQL Server, allow commas as wildcard characters. 返回的数据受到`pageIndex`并`pageSize`，其中`pageIndex`控制要返回哪些记录和`pageSize`控制要返回的记录数。The data returned is constrained by `pageIndex` and `pageSize`, where `pageIndex` controls which records to return and `pageSize` controls the number of records to return. 例如，如果`pageIndex`设置为 0 和`pageSize`已设置为 25，返回的数据将是前 25 个项。For example, if `pageIndex` was set to 0 and `pageSize` was set to 25, the data returned would be the first 25 entries. 如果`pageIndex`设置为 1 和`pageSize`已设置为 25，返回的数据将是 26 到 50 个项。If `pageIndex` was set to 1 and `pageSize` was set to 25, the data returned would be entries 26 to 50. `totalRecords`参数返回可用的记录总数。The `totalRecords` parameter returns the total number of records that are available.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回的集合实例`pathToMatch`值匹配具有共享个性化设置状态数据页的路径。This method returns a collection of instances where the `pathToMatch` value matches the path of a page that has shared personalization state data. 集合仅包含实例。The collection contains only instances. 此方法将参数通配符字符传递给基础个性化设置提供程序，那么，如何在数据存储区处理这些字符取决于提供程序如何处理字符，如星号 （\*）、 百分号 （%） 或下划线 (_)。This method passes parameter wildcard characters to the underlying personalization provider, so how the data store handles these characters depends on how the provider handles characters such as an asterisk (\*), a percent symbol (%), or an underscore (_). 通常情况下，对于符合 SQL 数据存储，你可以执行通配符搜索分部路径上加上使其不显示在开头、 末尾或搜索字符串文本中的中间的通配符属性。Normally, for SQL-compliant data stores, you can perform a wildcard search on a partial path with the wildcard character appearing at the beginning, the end, or the middle of the search string text in the property. 例如，若要查找以"~/vdir"开头的所有路径属性将设置为"~/vdir%"。For example, to find all paths that start with "~/vdir", the property would be set to "~/vdir%". 使用默认的个性化设置提供程序， -派生的对象返回按字母顺序，并按升序排序的路径和用户名称的组合。Using the default personalization provider, the -derived objects are returned in alphabetical order, and sorted by a combination of path and user name in ascending order. 集合中对象的顺序取决于提供程序。The ordering of the objects in the collection is determined by the provider. `pathToMatch`参数可以是`null`。The `pathToMatch` parameter can be `null`. 如果设置为`null`，在执行查询时，会忽略此参数。If set to `null`, the parameter is ignored when performing queries.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回的集合实例`pathToMatch`值匹配具有共享个性化设置状态数据页的路径。This method returns a collection of instances where the `pathToMatch` value matches the path of a page that has shared personalization state data. 集合仅包含实例。The collection contains only instances. 此方法将参数通配符字符传递给基础个性化设置提供程序，那么，如何在数据存储区处理这些字符取决于提供程序如何处理字符，如星号 （\*）、 百分号 （%） 或下划线 (_)。This method passes parameter wildcard characters to the underlying personalization provider, so how the data store handles these characters depends on how the provider handles characters such as an asterisk (\*), a percent symbol (%), or an underscore (_). 通常情况下，对于符合 SQL 数据存储，你可以执行通配符搜索分部路径上加上使其不显示在开头、 末尾或搜索字符串文本中的中间的通配符属性。Normally, for SQL-compliant data stores, you can perform a wildcard search on a partial path with the wildcard character appearing at the beginning, the end, or the middle of the search string text in the property. 例如，若要查找以"~/vdir"开头的所有路径属性将设置为"~/vdir%"。For example, to find all paths that start with "~/vdir", the property would be set to "~/vdir%". 使用默认的个性化设置提供程序， -派生的对象返回按字母顺序，并按升序排序的路径和用户名称的组合。Using the default personalization provider, the -derived objects are returned in alphabetical order, and sorted by a combination of path and user name in ascending order. 集合中对象的顺序确定提供程序。The order of the objects in the collection is determined by the provider. `pathToMatch`参数可以是`null`。The `pathToMatch` parameter can be `null`. 如果设置为`null`，在执行查询时，会忽略此参数。If set to `null`, the parameter is ignored when performing queries. 返回的数据受到`pageIndex`并`pageSize`，其中`pageIndex`控制要返回哪些记录和`pageSize`控制要返回的记录数。The data returned is constrained by `pageIndex` and `pageSize`, where `pageIndex` controls which records to return and `pageSize` controls the number of records to return. 例如，如果`pageIndex`设置为 0 和`pageSize`已设置为 25，返回的数据将是前 25 个项。For example, if `pageIndex` was set to 0 and `pageSize` was set to 25, the data returned would be the first 25 entries. 如果`pageIndex`设置为 1 和`pageSize`已设置为 25，返回的数据将是 26 到 50 个项。If `pageIndex` was set to 1 and `pageSize` was set to 25, the data returned would be entries 26 to 50. `totalRecords`参数返回可用的记录总数。The `totalRecords` parameter returns the total number of records that are available.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回的集合实例的位置`pathToMatch`参数值匹配的页上，路径和`usernameToMatch`匹配具有与该页关联的个性化设置数据的用户名称。This method returns a collection of instances where the `pathToMatch` parameter value matches the path of a page, and `usernameToMatch` matches a user name that has personalization data associated with that page. 集合仅包含实例。The collection contains only instances. 此方法将参数通配符字符传递给基础个性化设置提供程序，那么，如何在数据存储区处理这些字符取决于提供程序如何处理字符，如星号 （\*）、 百分号 （%） 或下划线 (_)。This method passes parameter wildcard characters to the underlying personalization provider, so how the data store handles these characters depends on how the provider handles characters such as an asterisk (\*), a percent symbol (%), or an underscore (_). 通常情况下，对于符合 SQL 数据存储，你可以执行通配符搜索分部路径上加上使其不显示在开头、 末尾或搜索字符串文本中的中间的通配符属性。Normally, for SQL-compliant data stores, you can perform a wildcard search on a partial path with the wildcard character appearing at the beginning, the end, or the middle of the search string text in the property. 例如，若要查找以"~/vdir"开头的所有路径属性将设置为"~/vdir%"。For example, to find all paths that start with "~/vdir", the property would be set to "~/vdir%". 同样，对部分用户名执行通配符搜索可以允许显示的文本字符串中的任意位置的通配符字符属性。Likewise, a wildcard search on a partial user name could have the wildcard character appear at any point in the text string of the property. 例如，若要查找与"John"开头的所有用户名称属性如下所示"John %"。For example, to find all user names that start with "John", the property would look like "John%". 使用默认的个性化设置提供程序， -派生的对象返回按字母顺序，并按升序排序的路径和用户名称的组合。Using the default personalization provider, the -derived objects are returned in alphabetical order, and sorted by a combination of path and user name in ascending order. 集合中对象的顺序取决于提供程序。The ordering of the objects in the collection is determined by the provider. 这两`pathToMatch`并`usernameToMatch`可以是`null`。Both `pathToMatch` and `usernameToMatch` can be `null`. `usernameToMatch`参数可以具有逗号 （，），因为某些数据存储，例如运行 Microsoft SQL Server，允许使用逗号作为通配符。The `usernameToMatch` parameter can have commas (,) because some data stores, such as those running Microsoft SQL Server, allow commas as wildcard characters. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 完整的示例可在类概述主题。The complete example can be found in the class overview topic. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的集合中的项主要基于作用域，，然后该作用域对应的记录进一步减小为基于子集`pageIndex`和`pageSize`参数。The items in the collection returned are based primarily on scope, and then the records corresponding to that scope are further reduced to a subset based on the `pageIndex` and `pageSize` parameters. 返回的集合包含仅限，实例或仅限实例。The collection returned contains either instances only, or instances only. 返回的项受`pageIndex`并`pageSize`参数，其中`pageIndex`控制要返回哪些记录和`pageSize`控制返回的记录数。The items returned are constrained by the `pageIndex` and `pageSize` parameters, where `pageIndex` controls which records to return and `pageSize` controls the number of records returned. 例如，如果`pageIndex`设置为 0 和`pageSize`已设置为 25，返回的数据将是前 25 个项。For example, if `pageIndex` was set to 0 and `pageSize` was set to 25, the data returned would be the first 25 entries. 如果`pageIndex`设置为 1 和`pageSize`已设置为 25，返回的数据将是 26 到 50 个项。If `pageIndex` was set to 1 and `pageSize` was set to 25, the data returned would be entries 26 to 50. `totalRecords`参数返回可用的记录总数。The `totalRecords` parameter returns the total number of records that are available. 使用默认的个性化设置提供程序， -派生的对象返回按字母顺序，并按升序排序的路径和用户名称的组合。Using the default personalization provider, the -derived objects are returned in alphabetical order, and sorted by a combination of path and user name in ascending order. 集合中对象的顺序确定提供程序。The order of the objects in the collection is determined by the provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回的记录页与匹配指定`pathtoMatch`参数和用户的属性值是否小于或等于属性值。This method returns records where the page matches the specified `pathtoMatch` parameter and the user's property value is less than or equal to the property value. 如果设置为，返回所有用户的个性化设置信息的计数。If is set to , a count of all users' personalization information is returned. 请注意，`pathToMatch`参数可以包含通配符。Note that the `pathToMatch` parameter can include wildcard characters. 该方法将通配符字符传递给基础数据存储区。The method passes wildcard characters to the underlying data store. 当前依赖于每个提供程序如何处理字符，如星号 （\*）、 百分号 （%） 或下划线 (_) 通配符的支持。Wildcard character support is currently dependent on how each provider handles characters such as an asterisk (\*), a percent symbol (%), or an underscore (_). 通常情况下，对于符合 SQL 数据存储，你可以执行通配符搜索分部路径上加上使其不显示在开头、 末尾或搜索字符串文本中的中间的通配符属性。Normally, for SQL-compliant data stores, you can perform a wildcard search on a partial path with the wildcard character appearing at the beginning, the end, or the middle of the search string text in the property. 例如，若要查找以"~/vdir"开头的所有路径属性将设置为"~/vdir%"。For example, to find all paths that start with "~/vdir", the property would be set to "~/vdir%". `pathToMatch`参数可以是`null`。The `pathToMatch` parameter can be `null`. 如果设置为`null`，在执行查询时，会忽略此参数。If set to `null`, the parameter is ignored when performing queries.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回数的每用户个性化设置项存在的基础数据存储区中给定`usernameToMatch`。This method returns a count of the number of per-user personalization items in the underlying data store that exist for the given `usernameToMatch`. 请注意，`usernameToMatch`参数可以包含通配符。Note that the `usernameToMatch` parameter can include wildcard characters. 此方法将通配符字符传递给基础数据存储区。This method passes wildcard characters to the underlying data store. 当前依赖于每个提供程序如何处理字符，如星号 （\*）、 百分号 （%） 或下划线 (_) 通配符的支持。Wildcard character support is currently dependent on how each provider handles characters such as an asterisk (\*), a percent symbol (%), or an underscore (_). 通常情况下，对于符合 SQL 数据存储，对部分用户名通配符搜索可以显示的文本字符串中的任意位置的通配符字符属性。Normally, for SQL-compliant data stores, a wildcard search on a partial user name can have the wildcard character appear at any point in the text string of the property. 例如，若要查找与"John"开头的所有用户名称参数将如下所示"John %"。For example, to find all user names that start with "John", the parameter would look like "John%". `usernameToMatch`参数可以是`null`。The `usernameToMatch` parameter can be `null`. 如果设置为`null`，在执行查询时，会忽略此参数。If set to `null`, the parameter is ignored when performing queries. `usernameToMatch`允许参数包含逗号 （，），因为某些数据存储，例如运行 Microsoft SQL Server，允许使用逗号作为通配符。The `usernameToMatch` parameter is allowed to have commas (,) because some data stores, such as those running Microsoft SQL Server, allow commas as wildcard characters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回个性化设置提供程序的集合。This property returns a collection of personalization providers. 在应用程序的初始化填充集合，其包含对按名称进行索引的提供程序对象的引用。The collection is populated at the initialization of the application and contains references to provider objects indexed by name. 默认提供程序的 Web.config 或 Machine.config 配置文件中指定的名称编制索引。The default provider is indexed by the name specified in the Web.config or Machine.config configuration file. 请注意，返回的集合是只读的;调用`Remove`， `Add`，或`Clear`将导致引发异常。Note that the returned collection is read-only; calls to `Remove`, `Add`, or `Clear` will result in an exception being thrown.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将具有指定路径关联的基础数据存储中的所有每用户状态重置的用户的属性值是否小于或等于属性值。This method resets all per-user state in the underlying data store associated with the specified path, where the user's property value is less than or equal to the property value. 对于数据存储需要多个要存储为页，或个性化设置状态的数据行的用户和页面组合，重置的行数可能不同于个性化设置状态的计数。For data stores that require more than one row of data to store personalization state for a page, or for a user and page combination, the count of reset rows might differ from the count of personalization state. 如果基础提供程序公开一个识别事务的数据存储区中的数据，此方法在单个事务中执行其操作。If the underlying provider exposes data from a transaction-aware data store, this method performs its operations in a single transaction. 它不是尝试重置不存在共享的状态错误。It is not an error to attempt to reset nonexistent shared state. 如果是，此方法有效地重置基础数据存储区指定路径中的所有每用户数据。If is , this method effectively resets all per-user data in the underlying data store for the specified path.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将重置的个性化设置数据在基础数据存储区，基于集合中包含的对象。This method resets personalization data in the underlying data store, based on the objects contained in the collection. 可以使用此方法有选择地删除了各种共享和每个用户的数据基于集合的内容。You can use this method to selectively delete a mixture of shared and per-user data based on the collection's contents. 对象指示将重置页的共享的数据的;对象指示每个用户数据的特定页面将重置。 objects indicate that shared data for a page will be reset; objects indicate that per-user data for a specific page will be reset. > [!NOTE] > 此方法不保证所有重置发生在单个事务中，因为集合指向随机的个性化设置数据集。This method does not guarantee that all resets occur within a single transaction because the collection points to random sets of personalization data. 它不是错误的将包含引用不存在的数据的对象的集合。It is not an error for the collection to contain objects that reference nonexistent data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将重置基础数据存储区中包含每个用户与关联中的每个用户状态`usernames`参数指定的页 `path.`This method resets per-user state in the underlying data store associated with each user contained in the `usernames` parameter for the page specified by `path.` 它不是尝试重置不存在用户状态错误。It is not an error to attempt to reset nonexistent user state.
